Christos autotheos, or, An historical account of the heresie denying the Godhead of Christ Addison, Lancelot, 1632-1703.
[8], 107, [4] p.
Printed by Tho. Hodgkin for Robert Clavell ..., London : 1696.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library. Part of title transliterated from Greek. Attributed to Lancelot Addison. cf. NUC pre-1956. Advertisement: p. [1]-[4] at end.
